title: Grenz-Kebap
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Fast food, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Turkish, Arabic, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Typical Turkish fast food cafe. The owners are interested in catering to vegans. Offers a vegan seitan-döner with house-made sauces (try the pomegranate-sauce), dürüm with vegan dough, and the pizza can be requested vegan by replacing dairy for vegan cheese and meat for seitan.
